artist: Painter: After Alexandre Moitte; Engraver: Goumaz
description: Interior; peasant at center sharpening a blade; wife standing in front of him holding a baby; old woman at right seated next to spinnint wheel delousing young boy; at left a boy playing with a large wheel

Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black : 60 / Moitte pinx.   Goumaz sc. /  Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain | on sheet in pencil at lower left: 2-100 2-80
